detailsData.title: Experienced Legal Team
detailsData.content: We have more than 20 years of combined experience. Our firm has the resources and dedication to work hard for you.

detailsData.title: Accessible 24/7
detailsData.content: We are accessible 24/7 for clients in Connecticut. We respond promptly to calls, texts, and emails.

detailsData.title: Strong Attorney-Client Relationships
detailsData.content: We provide the support and counsel you need through strong attorney-client relationships. You will never have to worry about the dedication of your attorney when you retain our firm.

detailsData.title: Free Case Evaluation
detailsData.content: We provide a free, no-obligation case evaluation. You have nothing to lose by contacting our firm.

subHeading: Strength in Your Time of Need
valueProp: At Carlson & Dumeer, LLC, our Hartford lawyers are backed by skills and knowledge to protect your rights and future. As a dual practice area law firm, we handle matters related to personal injury law and criminal defense law for clients in Hartford and Middletown.
CTA: Contact us at (877) 795-5594 today to get started on your criminal defense or personal injury case in Hartford. When your future is hanging in the balance, let our attorneys fight for you!

testimonalData.text: They got me a great award, but more importantly the level of service they gave me was phenomenal.
testimonalData.author: J.L.F.

testimonalData.text: When you are so badly injured and shaken up you really need a champion and I found that in Attorney Dumeer.
testimonalData.author: K.T.E.

testimonalData.text: You were recommended from a friend and I feel you went above and beyond to settle this case in reasonable time.
testimonalData.author: C.G.
